question: What is the name of the project which has launched by the government of Maharashtra to promote solar energy in the agricultural sector?
explanation: Atal Solar Krishi Pump Yojana has been launched by the government of Maharashtra to promote solar energy in the agricultural sector. As per the scheme, the farmers will get a subsidy of up to 95% on solar pumps. Recently, it has been decided that two LED bulbs, a DC fan and a mobile charging socket will also be provided.
